mapper.update: update ez_cm set cm_hits=cm_hits+1 where cm_bnum=#{cm_bnum}
update ez_cm set cm_title = #{cm_title}, cm_content = #{cm_content}, cm_file = #{cm_file}, cm_regdate = now() where cm_bnum = #{cm_bnum}
update ez_cm set cm_bnum = cm_bnum - 1 where cm_bnum > #{cm_bnum} and cm_bnum <= (select tmp.cnt from (select count(*) as cnt from ez_cm where cm_bnum > #{cm_bnum}) tmp) + #{cm_bnum}
mapper.select: select count(like_bnum) from ez_cm_like where like_bnum = #{like_bnum}
